ValidationRule.description: When Retraining is on, and Retraining Type is 'Rolling', Retraining Interval and Days To Complete are required and both must be positive integers.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( PDLM__Retraining__c = true, TEXT(PDLM__Retraining_Type__c) = 'Rolling', OR ( ISNULL( PDLM__Retraining_Interval__c ), PDLM__Retraining_Interval__c < 1 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Retraining is on, and Retraining Type is 'Rolling', Retraining Interval and Days To Complete are required and both must be positive integers.
